summary: Documentary on the underrated, influential director.
cast: Fred Bailey|Budd Boetticher|Peter Bogdanovich|Mary Chelde|Clint Eastwood|John Ford|Taylor Hackford|Ed Harris|Arnold Kunert|Blake Lucas|Nancy Pendleton|Andrew Sarris|Paul Schrader|Robert Stack|Quentin Tarantino|Kevin Thomas|Robert Towne|Gretchen Wayne
title: Budd Boetticher: An American Original
